text: @GOP We have an EMERGENCY: @realDonaldTrump & @Mike_Pence's made WRONG DECISIONS with regards to #COVID19. "Wishful thinking" that the virus would "DISAPPEAR," be behind us by Summer IS NOT A STRATEGY! Another self-imposed #Trump crisis made worst by  @Mike_Pence @VP @FoxNews
